meanings.definition: A protein component of myosin found in muscle fibers.
meanings.sent1: The meromyosin in muscle fibers helps with movement.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the meromyosin to understand muscle structure.
meanings.sent3: The meromyosin protein threw a party for the other muscle components.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness was as strong as meromyosin in muscle fibers.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate details of meromyosin in muscle fibers.

meanings.definition: A subunit of myosin that plays a role in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent1: During exercise, meromyosin aids in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent2: Athletes rely on the function of meromyosin for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The meromyosin subunit told jokes to keep the muscles entertained.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was as powerful as meromyosin in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the crucial role of meromyosin in muscle contraction.
